description:

She suffers beautifully in a difficult stress position, and sweats it out till the House Guests get off on her pain, Only then is she allowed to get hers, and to earn some dick.
Meanwhile, Casey is on hand to encourage and delight the guests with her hot, kinky little body and her sexy masochism.
As Brunch concludes, the slaves are lead to the lounge where the sexual service takes place. These slaves have allot of cock to satisfy. Casey's hunger for anal sex and Rilynn's fresh faced hard fucking drives the entire party into sexual overdrive as a full fledged kinky orgy breaks out.
Rilynn's petition is considered as she wipes the come off her face - you decide - is she House Slave material?
title: The Slave Petition of Rilynn Rae
